alert.note: Alert for Eastern Box Elder County; Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Tooele and Rush Valleys (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 10 at 7:34PM MST until January 11 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. * WHERE...Tooele and Rush Valleys, Eastern Box Elder County, Northern Wasatch Front and Salt Lake Valley. * WHEN...Until 8 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Be prepared for periods of winter driving conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Box Elder County; Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Tooele and Rush Valleys
